scripts.podman:build:
yarn run run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v podman) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "podman build $(echo $(build-env dmnDevSandbox.baseImage.buildTags) | xargs printf -- "-t $(build-env dmnDevSandbox.baseImage.registry)/$(build-env dmnDevSandbox.baseImage.account)/$(build-env dmnDevSandbox.baseImage.name):%s
" | xargs echo) --build-arg QUARKUS_PLATFORM_VERSION=$(build-env quarkusPlatform.version) --build-arg KOGITO_RUNTIME_VERSION=$(build-env kogitoRuntime.version) -f Containerfile" --else "echo Podman not found, skipping image build."
scripts.build:prod:darwin:linux: yarn run run-script-if --bool "$(build-env global.build.docker)" --then "yarn copy:assets" "yarn podman:build"
